helm-nemo.heading: Deploy NeMo Microservices
pre_commands: echo 'ðŸ” Checking Kubernetes cluster connectivity...' && kubectl cluster-info --request-timeout=10s

echo 'ðŸŒ‹ Installing Volcano scheduler...' && kubectl apply -f https://raw.githubusercontent.com/volcano-sh/volcano/master/installer/volcano-development.yaml 2>/dev/null || echo '   (Volcano may already be installed)'
echo 'ðŸ”‘ Creating namespace and NGC secrets...' && kubectl create namespace nemo --dry-run=client -o yaml | kubectl apply -f -

kubectl create secret docker-registry nvcrimagepullsecret --docker-server=nvcr.io --docker-username='$oauthtoken' --docker-password="${NGC_API_KEY}" -n nemo --dry-run=client -o yaml | kubectl apply -f -
kubectl create secret generic ngc-api --from-literal=NGC_API_KEY="${NGC_API_KEY}" -n nemo --dry-run=client -o yaml | kubectl apply -f -
helm-nemo.command: helm install nemo-microservices ./nemo-microservices-helm-chart --set ngcAPIKey="${NGC_API_KEY}" --set tags.auditor=true --set tags.studio=true --set tags.safe-synthesizer=true --namespace nemo
